definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Zc l:16 line (cf. Kö:ii. l. 40 Anm. 2);—abs. [[קַו]] Ez Eze 47:3 + Zec 1:16 Qr (Kt [[קוה]]), [[קָָו]] Is 34:17 +; cstr. [[קַו]] 2Ki 21:13 +;—measuring-line ([[מִדָּה]] ´[[ק]]: Je 31:39): 1Ki 7:23 (Qr; Kt [[קוה]], v. infr.) = 2Ch 4:2, Ez Eze 47:3; for marking off a possession inland Is 34:17 (fig.); esp. [[עַל]]´[[נְטָה ק]]: in building, Job 38:5 (fig. of earth), Zec 1:16 ([[יִנְּטֶה]]; ‖[[יִבָּנֶה ]]), so ´[[יְחָא ק]]: Je 31:39 (Qr; Kt [[קיה]]); ´[[נׇטָה ק]]: of designing idol Is 44:13; marking off for destruction, [[עַל]]´[[נׇטָה ק]]: 2Ki 21:13, Is 34:11 ([[קַרתׂהוּ]]), ´[[ק]] :´[[נ]]: La 2:8; so [[מִשְׁפָּט לְêָקו וְשַׂמְתִּ֫י]] Is 28:27.—[[קַוׇּם]] Ps 19:5 (AV their line. fig. of their domain) rd. prob. [[קׂלָם]] their sound, Capp. Ol Che and now most. Is 18:2, Is 18:7 v. [[קוקו]] -infr.; Is 28:10, Is 28:13 v. 1. [[קַו]].
